name: white-smoke
short_effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
